briefTitle: Chemotherapy and Radiation in Treating Participants With Stage 3 Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
officialTitle: Phase 3 Study of Pemetrexed, Cisplatin, and Radiotherapy Followed by Consolidation Pemetrexed Versus Etoposide, Cisplatin, and Radiotherapy Followed by Consolidation Cytotoxic Chemotherapy of Choice in Patients With Unresectable, Locally Advanced, Stage III Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Other Than Predominantly Squamous Cell Histology

arms.label: Arm A: Pemetrexed + Cisplatin and TRT
Arm B: Etoposide + Cisplatin and TRT

summary: This study will compare the overall survival of participants with locally-advanced, Stage III Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) with nonsquamous cell histology.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline to Date of Death from Any Cause (Up to 71.4 Months)

effectByArm.arm: Arm A: Pemetrexed + Cisplatin and TRT
Arm B: Etoposide + Cisplatin and TRT
